posts.post_content:
I have the following lot of 32 T-206's for sale. Scans of front and back are available on all cards. I do not have close ups but if it closes the deal I can make the time. Otherwise please ask for specific scans. The cards are all Sweet Caporal, Piedmont, Polar Bear and Old Mill. There are some with excess paper and some with paperloss but are marked. Cards look to be mainly Fair to VG-EX with a couple worse and a couple better. The list is below.

$400 delivered for the lot. First PM takes it.

***SOLD***

Thanks for looking !!

Ames Portrait-PD 150- 20

MINOR LEAGUES

Bump for this evening. Will begin individual cards sales this weekend if not sold as lot.

If this doesn't sell as a lot, I would like a first crack if possible at:

1) Leifield
2) Chase both pink/blue portrait


Thanks!

posts.post_title: I need about 35 cards to round out a 100 card submission to PSA
posts.post_content:
Adam,

Would you either be willing to:

a) sell your best condition presumably VG or better cards at a group discount (presumably around 30% off what a graded card would likely sell for)

b) combine forces and help me round out a 100 card submission to PSA?  It takes the per card cost down from $8 to $6.

If either option sound interesting .... shoot me an email.

[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
Last bump before pulling the vg or better ones for grading.
Can't update the shag and Hart from the iPad but they are off hold. Will hit laptop later.
CArd arrived very quickly and safely.  Thanks Adam.

PM sent on

$6 Hinchman Cleveland OM-paperloss
$22 Murphy Throwing OM
$5 Oldring batting SC 350-46
$12 Pfeister throwing PB
$15 Steinfeldt PD 150-paperloss
$18 Street catching OM
$18 Batch OM

What are you looking to get for all 77 cards?  (If I were to buy them all.)

Please send reply to mzljapan or [url]zach.lawrence@gmail.com[/url]

thanks
Zach
(913) 558-3001
